body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Harold Richardson and I'm with Secure Autos, how can I assist you today? May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is Mary Hernandez.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Mary. Can you provide me with your date of birth for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My date of birth is zero two dash one zero dash one nine seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Could you also confirm your phone number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My phone number is five five five dash three three three dash two two two two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Mary. I will now review your account to address your security concerns. I appreciate your patience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It appears that we can enhance the security features of your vehicle to alleviate your nerves. I will send you the details on how to proceed.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That would be great, thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Mary. Thank you for reaching out to us. If you have any further questions, don't hesitate to contact us. Have a wonderful day! Goodbye.
